name: Flüssiggas-Lagerbehälter nach Europäischen Richtlinien
description:
DIN 4680, PED and AD 2000,
(domestic tank), for overground installation 
for the storage of LPG (propane/butane), tank diameter 1250 mm,
Capacity:
 - 4000 Ltrs.
Connections:
 - none
- fitted with follwing equipment
1. Safety relief valve/s 2”, type RS 3136 + CD 36, setting pressure 17.2 bar
2. Filler Valve - Liquid inlet 1-1/4” NPT, tpye Rego 7501
3. Liquid withdrawal with Excess Flow Valve 1-1/4" NPT, type Rego 3282C
with ball valve 1-1/4" NPT thread class 800, type ALFA/BONETTI
4. Pressure gauge with valve ¼”, type Rego 948
5. Liquid Level gauge, type Rochester SENIOR with 50 mm dial
6. Vapour withdrawal with excess flow valve 1-1/4” NPT 
rype RegO 7556R and type Rego 3282C 
with ball valve 1-1/4" NPT thread class 800, type ALFA/BONETTI
7. Drain 1-1/4” with excess flow valve, type Rego 3282C
8. Fixed ullage gauge 85%, type Rego TSS3169
...
 - model-/TÜV-testing approval
 - CE-marking acc. to 2014/68/EU for pressure equipment,
incl. declaraction of conformity
Remarks:
 - 5 years guarantee for painting/laquering
 - drawing: Will be issued after receipt of order
